svg.aria-description: 'named color' (https://www.namedcolor.com) is an art project on named colors by Erik Lumbela (https://www.eriklumbela.com). All included colors represent one of the 148 named colors. They are available for download as SVG and HTML. 'named color' NFTs can be found on OpenSea (https://opensea.io/eriklumbela). Additionally, 'named color' is available in print, book, magazine, and mural forms.
svg.title: ghost white
